response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by you. I am confident it will provide significant benefits to you. Considering its high value to you and the exceptional quality, I propose to sell it to you for $9,500. This offer allows us both to benefit - you get a valuable asset at a price that's still quite attractive compared to its perceived value, while I secure a transaction that maximizes the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
